name: Project 2 - Terminal Hacker
description:
Project Objective: Learn how to program in C#

The game is about hacking places only from you computer terminal. When you're hacking a place you are given a scrambled word based on the location and your goal is to guess the password by unscrambling the word.

In this project I learned how to that methods from scripts and implement them into other scripts.

For a modification I added a boarder around the menus.
